Package cbf.utils

Provides generic utilities to be used across the framework

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CsvAccess.RowHandler
    Abstract row handler for the read interface This will be called repeatedly for each row of the csv file being read
    CsvAccess.RowSelector  
    DTAccess.RowSelector
    Interface to select row
    ExcelAccess.NamedRowAccess
    Sets and gets the value of rows
    ExcelAccess.RowAccess
    Accesses row of sheet and sets respective values
    ExcelAccess.RowHandler
    Handles row data
    RegExUtils.Handler
    Matches String
    RegExUtils.Replacements
    Performs match and replaces string
    Substitutor.Substitution  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlmFactory
    Makes and manages the connection with ALM
    CliUtils
    Reading the Run Arguments
    Configuration
    Represents a common XML-based configuration.
    CsvAccess
    Handles all the function related to accessing CSV files
    CsvAccess.MapHandler
    RowHandler implementation for CSV files containing a table of fixed columns First row is expected to be the list of keys.
    CsvAccess.RowArrayBuilder
    Extends MapHeader class and defines its abstract method
    DataRow
    Wrapper class on DataRow
    DBUtils
    Utility to handle connection to Database
    DesignerAccess
    Utility to handle MongoDB connection
    DTAccess
    Implements functionalities like readrows to read all rows from component sheet, read selected rows etc.
    DTAccess.RowSelectorByRowId
    Implements RowSelector interface and selects row by ID
    ExcelAccess
    Handles all the function related to Excel Data sheet like reading sheet,reading row,etc..
    ExcelAccess.MapReader
    Extending NamedRowHandler class and handles row data
    ExcelAccess.NamedRowHandler
    Implementing RowHandler interface and handles row data
    ExcelAccess.RowArrayBuilder
    Extends MapHeader class and defines its abstract method
    FileUtils
    A collection of utilities for manipulating files
    HtmlUtils
    Converting object to HTML
    JsonUtils
    Handles all Json related utilities
    LogUtils
    Utility provides functionalities related to logging.
    MiscUtils  
    PersistentMap
    Dealing with PersistentMap extending HashMap
    PluginManager
    Utilities related to PluginManager
    RegExUtils
    Utility handles string matching and replacement functionalities.
    SleepUtils
    Utility to handle sleep with different time slabs.
    StringUtils
    Utility to convert various data types to string
    Substitutor
    Evaluates the expression which provided as parameters for test step.
    TypeUtils
    Generic utility functions.
    UniqueUtils
    Utility to retrieve unique string
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SleepUtils.TimeSlab
    Enum to define different sleep levels
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FrameworkException
    Utility for dealing with framework exceptions extending Runtime exceptions

Package cbf.utils Description

Provides generic utilities to be used across the framework
Author:
Capgemini
